entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
